title: Pixel 2 broke after 3 months. Was guaranteed a NEW phone by 3 reps. Sent me refurbished phone.
content: We ordered a pixel 2 new from Google in October last year (3 months ago) and plugged it in one night last week and the next morning it was completely dead. I file a warranty claim, and Google sends me refurbished phone after 2 reps guaranteed me out would be new and not refurbished. Send me refurbished phone. HOW?
